search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Tidbyt (tidbyt.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I could not locate the exact pricing page URL for Tidbyt on their official domain. You might want to visit their main website [tidbyt.com](https://tidbyt.com) to explore pricing directly.

extracted_content.content:
What you care about at a glance
-------------------------------

Tidbyt is a retro-style display that lets you keep up with the things you care about, like real time sports, transit, finance and more.

![Image 1](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/tbt-sbs-wb.png?v=1682364293&width=2048)

Getting started

Getting started

Getting started

Getting started

Getting started

Getting started

Getting started 

Easy to Setup

Plug it in and pick from hundreds of apps. Choose what you want and Tidbyt cycles through it all.

![Image 2](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/sunrise-front_br-walnut.png?v=1683828051&width=375)

Fit Your Schedule

Use your phone to adjust Tidbyt's brightness, put it in night mode, or have it rise and set with the sun.

![Image 3](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/appsplash-web_c2a52b7c-0a93-478b-b4d9-72f3b43d09b9.webp?v=1678666471&width=375)

Hundreds of Apps

With Tidbyt's ever-growing library of apps, it has something for everyone

![Image 4](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/breakfast.png?v=1684165593&width=375)

Control from anywhere

Send messages and pictures from anywhere in the world

![Image 5](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/tidbytdev.png?v=1677954239&width=375)

Build Your Own

New or experienced, Tidbyt is a fun and great way to get started with coding. Learn more at tidbyt.dev

pre-orders now open

Introducing Tidbyt Gen 2
------------------------

Our best display yet! Running all the same amazing apps as the original Tidbyt, Gen 2 comes with new features and improvements.

![Image 6](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/mlb-nyy-mil_soona_1.png?v=1682973510&width=2048)

Live sports
-----------

Live scores on your terms with Tidbyt. Keep track of Football, Baseball, Basketball, and more during dinner, family visits, or whatever else is on your plate.

![Image 7](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/theverge.png?v=1683821454&width=1000)

![Image 11](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/spot-kitchen.png?v=1666667112&width=1361)

Never miss a beat
-----------------

Stay up to date on whats playing right now on Spotify and Sonos. Never miss your favorite new song again.

![Image 12](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/musiclogos.png?v=1665958936&width=320)

![Image 13](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/IMG_6123.jpg?v=1678123001&width=1536)

Google home integration
-----------------------

Show the apps when you need them by asking your Nest speaker or the Google voice assistant on your phone.

meet your

Personal Pixel Display
----------------------

![Image 14](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/HomepageChewie_R3_Edit_V4.png?v=1657401590&width=2990)

For Work
--------

Connect your team with Tidbyt. Celebrate company milestones, show recognition, display reminders, metrics and upcoming events.

![Image 15](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/b2bmock-2.png?v=1690312015&width=2048)

Partnership Solutions
---------------------

Tidbyt offers a unique way to connect with your customers and clients. Preload your own apps onto devices, develop in house apps for your company, engravings and much more. Explore some of our case studies to learn more.

![Image 16](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/mets-package-top.png?v=1683043813&width=2812)

Easy to Setup
-------------

Connect your phone, select your apps, stay in the know.

![Image 17](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/IMG_7179.png?v=1683134101&width=1170)

![Image 18](https://tidbyt.com/cdn/shop/files/IMG_7180.png?v=1683134080&width=1170)

Tidbyt keeps you updated on transit, weather and more. Leave your phone in your pocket.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Tidbyt appears to be a one-time purchase product without subscription tiers.
